modName: Full Body Tattoo for CBBE v2 Females
summary: This is for the tattoo lovers who play Skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
Updated 12/30/11 with the \"mostly evil girl versions.\" Just an FYI, the \"text\" on the body is in the \"oblivion alphabet,\" and lists the major Daedric gods. If you get the \"Oblivion Fonts,\" see if you can translate them all. 

Updated 12/28/11 with the \"mostly good girl versions.\" 

I make this for my personal use and decided to upload it and give back to the community. This is a full body tribal tattoo for females. As I am realy enjoy playing as a \"werewolf,\" so I added hair to the genital areas and underarms; figured it\'s fitting for a werewolf character even in human form and it\'s sorta cute imho. I know this little \"extra\" won\'t be for everyone, but if enough people like what I\'ve done, I would consider making a \"hair free\" version etc.

****Instructions****

Must have the CBBEv2 meshes with Fem Feet or this won\'t work! 

Just install the texture in the proper location. I suggest you .bak your current .dds file in case you don\'t like this etc. 

***Other thoughts***

In the screenshots, the head model I\'m using is Better Females by Bella. This means the textures at the neckline don\'t line up real well. (known issue) Because of this, I added the tribal neck band to help \"hide\" the seam in this area; it should work for most head models this way, but I haven\'t tested it.

The larger the breasts the more \"exaggerated\" the tattoos will be in certain areas. (silly huge etc) This is the price we pay when putting 2d textures on 3d meshes and it makes doing tattoos very difficult.

I hope someone with more skills than I have might take the idea and do even more with it. There are far better modders out there than me.
author: Jammer2006
